meanings.definition: The action of repeating something that has already been said or written.
meanings.sent1: Her constant repetition of the same story bored her friends.
meanings.sent2: The repetition of the chorus in the song made it catchy.
meanings.sent3: The repetition of jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The repetition of waves crashing on the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The repetition of the alarm clock woke her up every morning.

meanings.definition: The recurrence of an action or event.
meanings.sent1: The repetition of the train schedule helped him plan his trip.
meanings.sent2: The repetition of the seasons brings changes in nature.
meanings.sent3: The repetition of his favorite TV show made him happy.
meanings.sent4: The repetition of history often teaches us valuable lessons.
meanings.sent5: The repetition of the melody in the music was comforting.
